statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

header.gameNote: HALL OF FAME TIP-OFF TOURNAMENT AT SPRINGFIELD MA

article.description: Justin Robinson scored 18 points, leading Rider to a 76-61 win over TCU on Saturday in the Hall of Fame Tip-Off tournament.
article.headline: Rider tops TCU in Hall of Fame Tip-Off tourney
article.linkText: Rider tops TCU in Hall of Fame Tip-Off tourney
article.story: SPRINGFIELD, Mass. -- Justin Robinson scored 18 points, leading Rider to a 76-61 win over TCU on Saturday in the Hall of Fame Tip-Off tournament. Rider (3-1) trailed 34-28 at the half, but made its first 11 shots and 16 of its first 17 of the second half to outscore the Horned Frogs 38-17 and take a 66-51 lead. The Broncos made 18 of 25 shots in the second half and were 28 of 49 for the game. Novar Gadson had 15 points for Rider, and Mike Ringgold had 12 off the bench. The Broncos' bench outscored TCU's 30-18. Ronnie Moss scored 15 points to lead TCU (2-1), while Garlon Green added 13 and Amric Fields had 12. TCU forced 10 turnovers and outrebounded Rider 19-15 in the first half. In the second half, Robinson took control early, scoring 12 points in the first 12 minutes. The Broncos finished with a 35-32 rebounding advantage, led by Ringgold and Jhamar Youngblood with eight each.
